metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11709 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Mozilla developers and community members reported memory safety bugs present in Firefox 67 and Firefox ESR 60.7. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort that some of these could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 60.8, Firefox < 68, and Thunderbird < 60.8.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Andreea Pavel, Christian Holler, Honza Bambas, Jason Kratzer, and Jeff Gilbert

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '68.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '60.8.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
